official_title: A bill to amend the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 to prohibit the issuance of a citation by the Secretary of Labor after the initial inspection of any workplace of an employer, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Occupational Safety and Health Act to direct the Secretary of Labor to issue warning notices to employers before issuing citations. Sets forth procedures for the issuance of warning notices and citations.
